summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Role-Based Project Management System for CCC. All 17 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified admin dashboard, client portal, and access control working correctly.
passed_tests: /api/client-projects/admin/clients returns list of all clients (admin only)
CCC Admin dashboard loads for admin user
Non-admin redirected from /ccc-admin with 'Access denied' message
Client Portal Dashboard displays project status, progress, action items
Admin can update client project and client sees updated data
Client can toggle action item completion
seed_data_creation: Test action items created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Role-based access control fully implemented and tested. Admin (crownccreative@gmail.com) can access /ccc-admin and manage all client projects. Non-admin users are redirected with 'Access denied' message. Client portal shows project status, progress, action items from database. Two-way file sharing endpoints exist but file upload requires Cloudinary configuration.

features_verified.admin_access_control: Admin login redirects to /portal, then can navigate to /ccc-admin successfully
features_verified.non_admin_access_denied: Non-admin users redirected from /ccc-admin with toast message 'Access denied. CCC Admin only.'
features_verified.admin_dashboard: Shows all clients, allows selecting client, editing status/progress/next steps, saving changes
features_verified.client_portal: Displays project status, progress bar, action items with toggle capability, messages section, file upload
features_verified.data_sync: Admin updates are immediately visible to client on their portal dashboard
